name: Bryweludramon
description: BryweLudramon is a Digimon made of fire in a quadrupedal dragon shape. It wears red armor on its head, legs, tail, and wings while its torso is a red draconic skull. Its helmet has a yellow horn and is eyeless as its gem-like eyes float just above its wings with blue flames, the right eye is green while the left one is blue.
